Gyaaaaah!\""},{"lineNumber":172113,"originalJapaneseLine":"パニックを起こしたケイブリスが","translatedEnglishLine":"Kavebris, overcome with panic,"},{"lineNumber":172114,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスを振りほどこうと両手を振り回して暴れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"flailed his arms wildly trying to shake off Rance."},{"lineNumber":172115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わわわ、分がっだぁぁ！　げぶっ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-wait, I get it! *gasp*!\""},{"lineNumber":172116,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様がお前の部下になってやる！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll become your subordinate!\""},{"lineNumber":172117,"originalJapaneseLine":"　靴だって舐める！　なんでもする！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll even lick your shoes! I’ll do anything!\""},{"lineNumber":172118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だ、だから殺さないで下さいぃぃい〜〜！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"S-so please don’t kill meeee~~!\""},{"lineNumber":172119,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お願いしますぅうぅうう〜〜〜！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I beg youuu~!\""},{"lineNumber":172120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おいおい、慌てて来てみれば！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey, when I hurried over here,"},{"lineNumber":172121,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんだこれは！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"what the hell is this!?\""},{"lineNumber":172122,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……どうやら、決着の時のようですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...It seems the time for a decisive battle has come.\""},{"lineNumber":172123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああぁああああ！　お前らはマエリータ隊！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaahhh! You guys are Maerita’s squad!\""},{"lineNumber":172124,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、おいおい！　なにを見てやがるぅ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, hey hey! What are you looking at!?\""},{"lineNumber":172125,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼む、助けてくれぇ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please, help me!\""},{"lineNumber":172126,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍総大将の地位でもなんでもくれてやる！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I’ll give you the position of great commander of the demon army or anything!\""},{"lineNumber":172127,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、差し上げますぅ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I’ll gladly offer it to you!\""},{"lineNumber":172128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、馬鹿野郎ストロガノフ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you idiot Stroganov!\""},{"lineNumber":172129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにボサッと見てやがんだぁ！　早く助け――っ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What the hell are you just staring at!? Give up!\""},{"lineNumber":172141,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前を助けようなんて奴、一人もおらんわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There’s not a single person who’d try to save you!\""},{"lineNumber":172142,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひいっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":172143,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あれ――？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, what—?\""},{"lineNumber":172144,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づけばケイブリスの肩を足場にして","translatedEnglishLine":"Before anyone realized it, Rance had used Kavebris’ shoulder as a foothold"},{"lineNumber":172145,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが跳び、姿を消していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"to leap up and then vanished from sight."},{"lineNumber":172146,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひ、ひいいい、ど、どこ！？　どこにぃいい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-w-where!? W-where are you!?\""},{"lineNumber":172147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははははははは！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":172148,"originalJapaneseLine":"上に跳んだランスが、カオスを両手に掴み現れる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, who had jumped up, appeared gripping Chaos in both hands."},{"lineNumber":172149,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃあああああああああああああ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaaaaaaaaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":172150,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、あたたたたたたーーーーーっく！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, aaaaattacccckkkkkk!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":172151,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの全身全霊を込めた必殺技が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance’s ultimate move, charged with all his spirit and strength,"},{"lineNumber":172152,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人ケイブリスの巨体に――","translatedEnglishLine":"struck the giant demon Kavebris—"},{"lineNumber":172153,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで一瞬の閃光のように、叩きつけられた。","translatedEnglishLine":"like a flash of light in an instant, slamming down."},{"lineNumber":172154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、がっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, gah...!\""},{"lineNumber":172155,"originalJapaneseLine":"斬られたことすら一瞬遅れて気づき、","translatedEnglishLine":"He realized he had been cut a moment too late,"},{"lineNumber":172156,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスは目の前の光景が信じられない顔で、","translatedEnglishLine":"and Kavebris stared at the scene before him with disbelief,"},{"lineNumber":172157,"originalJapaneseLine":"おたおたと自分の体に触れ――","translatedEnglishLine":"fumblingly touched his body—"},{"lineNumber":172158,"originalJapaneseLine":"自身の死を悟った。","translatedEnglishLine":"and understood his own death."},{"lineNumber":172159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I—\""},{"lineNumber":172160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「嫌だぁ！　死にたくなぁーーいーーーー！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nooo! I don’t want to dieeeee!!!!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう絶対に人に手を出さない！　魔軍も退かせる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I absolutely won’t lay a hand on anyone anymore! I’ll even withdraw the demon army!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、金が必要ならいくらでも用意する！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I’ll prepare as much money as you need!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女でもいい！　なんでも用意してみせる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even women are fine! I’ll provide anything!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから……」
「だから殺さないでくれぇぇええ！」
「ぎゃあぎゃあ喚くな！
そんな都合のいい話が今更通るか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Do you think a convenient story like that will fly now!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「テメェも魔軍総大将なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you’re the great commander of the demon army,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちったぁ根性見せてみたらどうだ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "then why don’t you show a little guts!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんなことして何になるぅ！
うわぁ首に刺さってる！　ぎゃあああ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa, it’s stuck in my neck! Gyaaaaah!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パニックを起こしたケイブリスが
ランスを振りほどこうと両手を振り回して暴れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: flailed his arms wildly trying to shake off Rance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わわわ、分がっだぁぁ！　げぶっ！
俺様がお前の部下になってやる！
靴だって舐める！　なんでもする！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ll even lick your shoes! I’ll do anything!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だ、だから殺さないで下さいぃぃい〜〜！
お願いしますぅうぅうう〜〜〜！」
「おいおい、慌てて来てみれば！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, when I hurried over here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは！？」
「……どうやら、決着の時のようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems the time for a decisive battle has come."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああぁああああ！　お前らはマエリータ隊！
おい、おいおい！　なにを見てやがるぅ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey hey! What are you looking at!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼む、助けてくれぇ！」
「魔軍総大将の地位でもなんでもくれてやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ll give you the position of great commander of the demon army or anything!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、差し上げますぅ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I’ll gladly offer it to you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、馬鹿野郎ストロガノフ！
なにボサッと見てやがんだぁ！　早く助け――っ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell are you just staring at!? Hurry and help—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラでもいい！」
「あぁああぁあぁああ！
ケイブワンとケイブニャンの二人は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where are Cave One and Cave Nyann, those two?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこ行ったぁあぁああぁあああ！」
「お願いだから！
誰か助けてくれええぇええーーー！」
「これが……
俺らが神輿として担ぎ続けた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "the last sight of the leader whom we carried on our shoulders like a sacred palanquin..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トップの最期の姿か……」
「がははは！　諦めろ！
お前を助けようなんて奴、一人もおらんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s not a single person who’d try to save you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひいっ！？」
気づけばケイブリスの肩を足場にして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before anyone realized it, Rance had used Kavebris’ shoulder as a foothold

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが跳び、姿を消していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to leap up and then vanished from sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひいいい、ど、どこ！？　どこにぃいい！」
「がははははははははははは！」
上に跳んだランスが、カオスを両手に掴み現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, who had jumped up, appeared gripping Chaos in both hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃあああああああああああああ！？」
「ランス、あたたたたたたーーーーーっく！！！！」
ランスの全身全霊を込めた必殺技が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s ultimate move, charged with all his spirit and strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスの巨体に――
まるで一瞬の閃光のように、叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a flash of light in an instant, slamming down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬られたことすら一瞬遅れて気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He realized he had been cut a moment too late,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは目の前の光景が信じられない顔で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kavebris stared at the scene before him with disbelief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おたおたと自分の体に触れ――
自身の死を悟った。
「嫌だぁ！　死にたくなぁーーいーーーー！！！！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: か、金が必要ならいくらでも用意する！

お願いしますぅうぅうう〜〜〜！」
「おいおい、慌てて来てみれば！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey, when I hurried over here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだこれは！？」
「……どうやら、決着の時のようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems the time for a decisive battle has come."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああぁああああ！　お前らはマエリータ隊！
おい、おいおい！　なにを見てやがるぅ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, hey hey! What are you looking at!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼む、助けてくれぇ！」
「魔軍総大将の地位でもなんでもくれてやる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I’ll give you the position of great commander of the demon army or anything!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、差し上げますぅ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, I’ll gladly offer it to you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい、馬鹿野郎ストロガノフ！
なにボサッと見てやがんだぁ！　早く助け――っ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What the hell are you just staring at!? Hurry and help—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャリエラでもいい！」
「あぁああぁあぁああ！
ケイブワンとケイブニャンの二人は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Where are Cave One and Cave Nyann, those two?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どこ行ったぁあぁああぁあああ！」
「お願いだから！
誰か助けてくれええぇええーーー！」
「これが……
俺らが神輿として担ぎ続けた、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "the last sight of the leader whom we carried on our shoulders like a sacred palanquin..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トップの最期の姿か……」
「がははは！　諦めろ！
お前を助けようなんて奴、一人もおらんわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "There’s not a single person who’d try to save you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひいっ！？」
気づけばケイブリスの肩を足場にして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before anyone realized it, Rance had used Kavebris’ shoulder as a foothold

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが跳び、姿を消していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to leap up and then vanished from sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひ、ひいいい、ど、どこ！？　どこにぃいい！」
「がははははははははははは！」
上に跳んだランスが、カオスを両手に掴み現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, who had jumped up, appeared gripping Chaos in both hands.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぎゃあああああああああああああ！？」
「ランス、あたたたたたたーーーーーっく！！！！」
ランスの全身全霊を込めた必殺技が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance’s ultimate move, charged with all his spirit and strength,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケイブリスの巨体に――
まるで一瞬の閃光のように、叩きつけられた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: like a flash of light in an instant, slamming down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 斬られたことすら一瞬遅れて気づき、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He realized he had been cut a moment too late,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスは目の前の光景が信じられない顔で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Kavebris stared at the scene before him with disbelief,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おたおたと自分の体に触れ――
自身の死を悟った。
「嫌だぁ！　死にたくなぁーーいーーーー！！！！」
